landing.description: A Bitcoin full node validates all transactions and blocks, allowing you to use Bitcoin in a trustless way while contributing to the Bitcoin network.

list.item1: Set up Bitcoin Core on a device with sufficient resources.
list.item2: Wait for your node to fully synchronize.
list.item3: Make note of your node RPC credentials, IP address, and port number.

landing.disclaimer: Running a full node requires a computer with sufficient resources and a broadband connection without data restrictions.

notConnected.disclaimer: Your full node must be fully synchronized before connecting Ledger Live.

nodeHost.title: Host
nodeHost.tooltip: Leave as default if node runs on this computer, or replace the node IP address and port number.

rpcCredentials.title: RPC Credentials
rpcCredentials.tooltip: Enter the RPC username and password of your node, found in the bitcoin.conf file.

tls.title: Use TLS
tls.tooltip: Enable Transport Layer Security, for example, when using a hosted node solution.

connecting.description: Please wait while we check if your full node is responding.

success.description: You can now configure your full node to scan for your accounts on the blockchain.

failure.description: Please ensure your node is fully synchronized and verify its connection settings.

pending.description: Please wait while the accounts to scan are added to the node configuration file.

success.description: A configuration file was saved to the user data folder. It enables Ledger SatStack to connect to your full node and let it scan for your accounts on the blockchain.

accounts.title: Accounts

accounts.toScanTooltip: Increase only if you have 10+ BTC accounts.  Initial scan will be slower.

notConnected.description: Ledger SatStack is a small application enabling Ledger Live to talk to your full node. Please download and run it before you continue.
notConnected.disclaimer: SatStack must be running for Ledger Live to connect to your full node.  Consider setting it to launch automatically when your computer boots.

satstack-disconnected.description: Please verify that SatStack is running on this computer.

satstack-outdated.description: The SatStack version you are using is too old and may contain bugs or incompatibilities.

node-disconnected.description: Please verify that your node is reachable and that the connection settings you entered are correct.

ready.description: The full node is fully synced. Your Bitcoin account balances are now correct.

syncing.description: Recent transactions may not yet be visible, so Bitcoin account balances may be incorrect. If possible, run your node continuously to keep it in sync.

scanning.description: You can add your accounts once the account scan is completed. Any Bitcoin accounts previously added through Ledger's explorers were removed.

disconnect.description: Are you sure? Disconnecting the full node will remove all Bitcoin accounts. You can add your accounts again using Ledgerâ€™s explorers.

firmware.followTheGuide: Follow our step by step update guide
firmware.deprecated: Device firmware version too old to be updated. Contact Ledger Support for a replacement.

firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1>firmware version {{version}}</1>.
firmware.downloadingUpdateDesc: Please wait for the update installer to be downloaded

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Confirm and enter your PIN code if requested.
modal.mcuFirst: Disconnect the USB cable from your device
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the <1><0>{{repairProcessing}}</0></1> screen appears
modal.mcuPin: Please wait for the update to finish
modal.mcuSecondNanoX: Press and hold the left button until <1><0>{{bootloaderOption}}</0></1> appears. Press both buttons to confirm and reconnect your device.
modal.mcuBlueFirst: Press and hold the side button for 10 seconds to turn off the device. Release the button.
modal.mcuBlueSecond: Press and hold the button for at least 5 seconds until the Boot Options are displayed. Tap Bootloader Mode
modal.successTextApps: Please re-install the apps on your device
modal.successTextNoApps: You can now install apps on your device

resetSteps.connect: Connect the {{deviceName}} to your computer using the USB cable.
resetSteps.turnOn: Press the button on the device to turn it on.
resetSteps.falsePin: Enter three wrong PINs to reset the device.
resetSteps.turnOff: Press and hold the side button until {{action}} is displayed.
resetSteps.boot: Press and hold the side button until {{option}} is displayed
resetSteps.recoveryMode: Tap {{mode}} Mode. Wait until the dashboard appears.
resetSteps.openLive: Open the Manager in Ledger Live.
resetSteps.uninstall: Click on the grey trash icon for all apps currently installed on the {{deviceName}}. This makes room for the firmware installer.
resetSteps.disclaimer: Note: Your funds are not affected by this operation, the private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Recovery sheet.

starter.description: Freeze TRX to earn rewards and still keep full security and control of your assets.

bond.description: To earn rewards, first bond an amount. Then you must nominate your validator(s).

unbond.title: Unbond
unbond.description: To make a bonded amount available again, first you need to unbond it. You can withdraw it after the 28-day unbonding period.

withdrawUnbonded.title: Withdraw
withdrawUnbonded.description: To retrieve an unbonded amount back to the available balance, you need to withdraw it manually.

nominate.title: Nominate
nominate.description: Choose up to 16 validators. Ensure nominations are Active to earn rewards.

chill.title: Clear nominations
chill.description: Remove all nominations. You will stop earning rewards. Your bonded amount remains bonded.

validators.title: Validators
validators.notValidatorsRemoved: You have nominated {{count}} addresses who are no longer validators. They will automatically be removed from your nominate transaction.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: You have successfully nominated validators
success.text: You will start earning rewards when your assets are bonded to your elected validator(s).

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

rewardDestination.label: Rewards Destination
rewardDestination.stashDescription: Rewards are credited to your available balance.
rewardDestination.stakedDescription: Rewards are credited to your bonded balance for compound earning.
rewardDestination.optionDescription: Once set, the option is fixed for the lifetime of this bond. If you change your mind, please read the article down below

starter.description: You may earn rewards by bonding your assets and then nominate your validators.
bullet: You keep ownership of bonded assets
Assets will be available again, 28 days after unbonding
starter.warning: Choose your validator wisely: Part of your bonded assets may be irrevocably lost if the validator does not behave appropriately.

amount.title: Amount
amount.info: Bonded assets can be unbonded at any time, but unbonding takes 28 days.

tooltip.title: Transaction awaiting confirmation
tooltip.desc: You have to wait a moment before nominating

confirmation.title: Confirmation

success.title: Assets successfully bonded
success.text: You can nominate validators once the network has confirmed the transaction.
success.textNominate: You will be able to nominate validators once the network has confirmed your transaction.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

amount.title: Amount
amount.info: Rebonded assets are immediately added to the bonded amount.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Assets successfully rebonded
success.text: Your account balance will update once the network has confirmed the transaction.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

amount.title: Amount
amount.info: Unbonded assets can be withdrawn after the 28-day unbonding period.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Unbond transaction sent successfully
success.text: Unbonded assets can be withdrawn in 28 days.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

withdrawUnbonded.title: Withdraw
withdrawUnbonded.description: After the 28-day unbonding period you can withdraw unbonded assets.
withdrawUnbonded.info: You can then withdraw unbonded assets to your available balance.

chill.title: Clear nominations
chill.description: Clears all nominations and stops earning rewards.
chill.info: Bonded assets will remain bonded. If you unbond them, they will be available after 28 days.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Transaction sent successfully
success.text: You will see your operation in history soon.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

delegation.title: Earn rewards
delegation.delegationEarn: You can now earn {{name}} staking rewards by delegating your account.

starter.title: Earn staking rewards
starter.description: Delegate your Tezos account to a third-party validator to earn staking rewards and still keep full security and control of your assets

bullet.access: You can access your assets at any time.
bullet.ledger: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

summary.title: Delegate account
summary.label: Summary
summary.termsAndPrivacy: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee any rewards from your validator.

validator.title: Select validator
validator.description: You can select a validator by comparing the estimated reward rates

custom.title: Custom validator
custom.text: Please enter the address of the custom validator to delegate your account to.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Delegation sent
success.text: Delegation transaction broadcasted successfully. You should earn your first rewards within around 40 days, depending on the validator.
success.textUndelegated: Your account delegation will end once the operation is confirmed. You can delegate your account again at any time.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please wait a moment then check the transaction history before trying again.

hidden.disclaimer: This banner will not show up again until there is a new announcement

accounts.title: Export accounts
accounts.desc: Add your accounts in Ledger Live mobile. Your accounts will only synchronize with the blockchain, not between your mobile and desktop apps.

operations.title: Operation history
operations.desc: Save a CSV file of your account operations on your computer.

modal.title: Scan to export to mobile
modal.listTitle: On the Ledger Live mobile app:
modal.step3: Scan the <1><0>LiveQR code</0></1> until the loader hits 100%

display.languageDesc: Set the language displayed in Ledger Live.
display.counterValueDesc: Choose the currency shown next to your balance and operations.
display.regionDesc: Choose your region to set the time zone of Ledger Live.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display market increases in blue or Eastern to display them in red.
display.carouselVisibilityDesc: Enable visibility of the carousel on Portfolio

currencies.desc: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: Set the number of network confirmations for a transaction to be marked as confirmed.

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to secure the Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: Automatically lock Ledger Live when inactive.
profile.softResetDesc: Clear the Ledger Live cache to force resynchronization with the blockchain.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction histories and settings.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger improve user experience. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions (send, receive, lock, etc), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, the Ledger device type and firmware.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger improve its products.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Set up a new device or restore an existing device. Accounts and settings are kept.

help.faqDesc: If you have a problem, get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.termsDesc: By using Ledger Live you are deemed to have accepted our Terms of Use.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use them.

experimental.disclaimer: These are experimental features we provide on an "as is" basis for our tech savvy community to test. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

hardResetModal.title: Reset Ledger Live
hardResetModal.desc: Reset Ledger Live to erase all settings and accounts on your computer. You can then choose your password and add your accounts back with your Ledger device. The private keys giving access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and are backed up by your recovery phrase.

softResetModal.title: Clear cache
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys to access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: User action required
resetFallbackModal.part1: Could not delete cache folder. Please delete the folder manually:
resetFallbackModal.part2: Click the Open folder button, the
resetFallbackModal.part5: Then you can restart the app normally.

removeAccountModal.title: Remove account
removeAccountModal.desc: This will not affect your crypto assets. Existing accounts can always be added again.

openUserDataDirectory.title: View user data
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

repairDevice.title: Repair your Ledger device
repairDevice.descSettings: Use this to restore your Ledger device if it froze during a firmware update.
repairDevice.desc: For Ledger Nano S users, please select the state displayed on your device. For Nano X and Blue users kindly refer to the help center.

exportLogs.title: Save logs
exportLogs.desc: Saving Ledger Live logs may be needed for troubleshooting purposes.

hideEmptyTokens.title: Hide empty token accounts
hideEmptyTokens.desc: Hide token accounts with zero balance on the Accounts page.

tokenBlacklist.title: Hidden tokens
tokenBlacklist.desc: You can hide tokens by going to the parent account then right-clicking on the token and selecting 'Hide token'.

fullNode.title: Connect Bitcoin full node
fullNode.desc: Set up your Bitcoin full node to synchronize and send transactions without using Ledgerâ€™s explorers.

setPassword.title: Password lock
setPassword.subTitle: Set the password
setPassword.desc: Keep your password safe. Losing it means resetting Ledger Live and adding the accounts again.

disablePassword.title: Disable password lock
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live data will be stored unencrypted on your computer. This includes account names, transactions and public addresses.

update.updateAvailable: Update to Ledger Live version {{version}} is available
update.error: Error during update. Please download again
update.nightlyWarning: This version cannot auto-update. Please install the latest version manually

crash.title: Something went wrong
crash.description: Please check our support articles for possible solutions. If the problem persists, save the logs using the button below and provide them to Ledger Support.

exportOperationsModal.title: Operation history
exportOperationsModal.desc: Select the accounts for which to save the operation history
exportOperationsModal.descSuccess: The CSV file of your operation history was saved successfully in the selected folder
exportOperationsModal.disclaimer: The countervalues in the export is provided for information purposes only. Do not rely on such data for accounting, tax, regulation or legal purposes, as they only represent an estimation of the price of the assets at the time of transactions and export, under the valuation methods provided by our service provider, Kaiko

statusOk.title: Ledger live is up and running
statusOk.description: Having trouble ? Go on our <0>help page</0>

emptyState.title: No news for the moment
emptyState.desc: You will find here all the news related to Ledger and Ledger live

pinHelp.title: Secure your PIN code
pinHelp.intro: During the setup process you choose a PIN code.

rules.2: <0>Always</0> enter your PIN code out of sight.
rules.3: You can change your PIN code if needed.
rules.4: Three wrong PIN code entries in a row will reset the device.
rules.5: <0>Never</0> use an easy PIN code like 0000, 123456, or 55555555.
rules.6: <0>Never</0> share your PIN code with someone else. Not even with Ledger.
rules.7: <0>Never</0> use a PIN code you did not choose yourself.
rules.8: <0>Never</0> store your PIN code on a computer or phone.

recoverySeed.title1: How does a recovery phrase work?
recoverySeed.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase works like a unique master key. Your Ledger device uses it to calculate private keys for every crypto asset you own.
recoverySeed.paragraph2: To restore access to your crypto, any wallet can calculate the same private keys from your recovery phrase.
recoverySeed.title2: What happens if I lose access to my Nano?
recoverySeed.paragraph3: Don't worry and follow these steps:

points.2: Select â€œRestore recovery phrase on a new deviceâ€ in the Ledger app
points.3: Enter your recovery phrase on your new device to restore access to your crypto.

whereToHide.title: Where should I keep my recovery phrase?

points.1: <0>NEVER</0> enter it on a computer, smartphone or any other device. Don't take a picture of it.
points.3: <0>ALWAYS</0> store it in a secure place, out of sight.
points.4: Ledger will never ask for your recovery phrase.
points.5: If any person or application asks for it, assume it is a scam!

beCareful.title: Please be careful
beCareful.descr: Make sure you follow the instructions on this app at every step of the process.

useLedgerSeeds.title: We recommend Ledger recovery phrases only
useLedgerSeeds.descr: Ledger cannot guarantee the security of external recovery phrases. We recommend setting up your Nano as a new device if your recovery phrase was not generated by a Ledger.

welcome.title: Welcome to Ledger
welcome.description: Safely manage your crypto from your computer.
welcome.noDevice: No device? <0>Buy a Ledger Nano X</0>

languageWarning.title: Get started in {{language}}
languageWarning.desc: We are introducing additional languages  in order to help your onboarding with Ledger. Please be aware that the rest of the Ledger experience is currently only available in English.

1.heading: First use
1.title: Set up a new {{deviceName}}
1.description: Letâ€™s start and set up your device!

2.heading: Connect device
2.title: Connect your {{deviceName}}
2.description: Is your device already set up? Connect it to the app!

3.heading: Restore device
3.title: Restore your recovery phrase on a new device
3.description: Use an existing recovery phrase to restore your private keys on a new {{deviceName}}!

importYourRecoveryPhrase.title: Restore from recovery phrase
importYourRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Restore your Nano from your recovery phrase to restore, replace or back up your Ledger hardware wallet.
importYourRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Your Nano will restore your private keys and you will be able to access and manage your crypto.

howToGetStarted.title: The best way to get you started:

rules.1: Plan 30 minutes and take your time.
rules.2: Grab a pen to write with.
rules.3: Stay alone, and choose a safe and quiet environment.

turnOn.title: Turn on Nano
turnOn.descr: Connect your device to your computer with the USB cable.

browse.title: Browse
browse.descr: Learn how to interact with your device by reading the on-screen instructions.

select.title: Select â€œSet up as new deviceâ€
select.descr: Press both buttons simultaneously to validate the selection.

follow.title: Follow instructions
follow.descr: Come back here to follow instructions on your PIN code.

turnOn.title: Turn on Nano
turnOn.descr: Connect your device to your computer with the USB cable.

browse.title: Browse
browse.descr: Learn how to interact with your device by reading the on-screen instructions.

select.title: Select â€œEnter your recovery phraseâ€
select.descr: Press both buttons simultaneously to validate the selection.

follow.title: Follow instructions
follow.descr: Come back here to follow instructions on your PIN code.

pinCode.title: PIN code
pinCode.paragraph: Your PIN code is the first layer of security. It physically secures access to your private key and your Nano. Your PIN code must be 4 to 8 digits long.
pinCode.disclaimer: I understand that I must choose my PIN code myself and keep it private.

quizSuccess.title: Already a pro!
quizSuccess.paragraph: You are ready to safely manage your crypto. Only one quick step left!

quizFailure.title: You will soon become a pro...
quizFailure.paragraph: Donâ€™t worry, Ledger is here to guide you through your journey. You will soon feel extra comfortable about your crypto safety. Only one quick step left!

setUp.title: Choose PIN code
setUp.descr: Press the left or right button to change digits. Press both buttons to validate a digit. Select <0></0> to confirm your PIN code. Select <1></1> to erase a digit.

confirm.title: Confirm PIN code
confirm.descr: Enter your PIN code again to confirm it.

existingRecoveryPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase is the secret list of words that you backed up when you first set up your wallet.
existingRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Ledger does not keep a copy of your recovery phrase.
existingRecoveryPhrase.disclaimer: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to my Nano.

warning.title: Do not use a recovery phrase that you have not generated yourself.
warning.desc: Your Ledger hardware walletâ€™s pin code and recovery phrase should be initialized by you and only you. If you have received a device with a pre-existing seed word or an already initialized pin code do not use the product and contact our customer support.

takeYourRecoverySheet.title: Take your recovery sheet
takeYourRecoverySheet.descr: Grab a blank Recovery sheet, included with your Nano. Please reach out to Ledger Support if the Recovery sheet did not come blank.

writeDownWords.title: Write down all words
writeDownWords.descr: Write Word #1 displayed on your Nano in position 1 of your Recovery sheet. Then press right on your Nano to display Word #2 and write it down in position 2. Repeat the process for all words while carefully respecting the order and spelling. Press left on your Nano to check for any mistakes.

newRecoveryPhrase.title: Recovery phrase
newRecoveryPhrase.paragraph1: Your recovery phrase is a secret list of 24 words that backs up your private keys.
newRecoveryPhrase.paragraph2: Your Nano generates a unique recovery phrase. Ledger does not keep a copy of it.
newRecoveryPhrase.disclaimer: I understand that if I lose this recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to my Nano.

selectLength.title: Select recovery phrase length
selectLength.descr: Your recovery phrases can have 12, 18 or 24 words. You must enter all words to access your crypto.

enterWord.title: Enter Word #1...
enterWord.descr: Enter the first letters of Word #1 by selecting them with the right or left button. Press both buttons to validate each letter.

validateWord.title: Validate Word #1...
validateWord.descr: Choose Word #1 from the suggestions. Press both buttons to validate.

reEnterWord.title: Confirm your recovery phrase
reEnterWord.descr: Scroll through the words until you find Word #1 by pressing the right button. Validate by pressing both buttons.

success.title: All good!
success.desc: Your Ledger {{deviceName}} is genuine and ready to use with Ledger Live

hideRecoveryPhrase.title: Hide your recovery phrase
hideRecoveryPhrase.paragraph: Your recovery phrase is your last chance to access your crypto if you cannot use your Nano. You must keep it in a safe place.
hideRecoveryPhrase.keepItOffline: Enter these words on a hardware wallet only, not on computers or smartphones.
hideRecoveryPhrase.neverShowToAnyone: Never share your 24 words with anyone, not even with Ledger.

pairMyNano.title: Genuine check
pairMyNano.paragraph: We'll verify whether your Nano is genuine. This should be quick and easy!

quizzSuccess.title: Already a pro!
quizzSuccess.paragraph: You are ready to safely manage your crypto. Only one quick step left!

quizzFail.title: You will soon become a pro...
quizzFail.paragraph1: Donâ€™t worry, Ledger is here to guide you through your journey. You will soon feel extra comfortable about your crypto safety.

accessYourCoins.title: Access your crypto
accessYourCoins.description: Your crypto assets are stored on the blockchain. You need a private key to access and manage them.

ownYourPrivateKey.title: Own your private key
ownYourPrivateKey.description: Your private key is stored within your Nano. You must be the only one to own it to be in control of your money.

stayOffline.title: Stay offline
stayOffline.description: Your Nano works as a "cold storage" wallet. This means that it never exposes your private key online, even when using the app.

validateTransactions.title: Validate transactions
validateTransactions.description: Ledger Live allows you to buy, sell, manage, exchange and earn crypto while remaining protected. You will validate every crypto transaction with your Nano.

setUpNanoWallet.title: Letâ€™s set up your Nano!
setUpNanoWallet.description: We'll start by setting up your Nano security.

quizz.heading: Quiz
quizz.title: Now game on!
quizz.descr: Answer 3 simple questions to avoid common misconceptions about your hardware wallet.

1.text: As a Ledger user, my crypto is stored:

success.title: Congrats!
success.text: Your crypto is always stored on the blockchain. Your hardware wallet only holds your private key, which gives you access to your crypto.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text: Your crypto is always stored on the blockchain. Your hardware wallet only holds your private key, which gives you access to your crypto.

2.text: If my recovery phrase is no longer secure or private...

answers.1: No problem, Ledger can send me a copy
answers.2: My crypto is no longer safe and I need to transfer them to a secure place

success.title: Congrats!
success.text:
Anyone who knows your recovery phrase can steal your crypto assets. 
If you lose it, you must quickly transfer your crypto to a secure place.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text:
Anyone who knows your recovery phrase can steal your crypto assets. 
If you lose it, you must quickly transfer your crypto to a secure place.

3.text: When I connect my Nano to the Ledger app, my private key is...

success.title: Congrats!
success.text: Your private key always remains offline in your hardware wallet. Even when connected to your Nano, the Ledger app cannot access your private key. You must physically authorize every transaction on your device.

fail.title: Incorrect!
fail.text: Your private key always remains offline in your hardware wallet. Even when connected to your Nano, the Ledger app cannot access your private key. You must physically authorize every transaction on your device.

connectTroubleshooting.desc: Having a hard time connecting your device?

TransactionConfirm.title: Please confirm the operation on your device to finalize it
TransactionConfirm.warning: Always verify the address displayed on your device exactly matches the one given by the {{recipientWording}}
TransactionConfirm.secureContract: Verify the deposit details on your device before sending it. The contract address is provided securely so you donâ€™t have to verify it.
TransactionConfirm.verifyData: Always verify the operation details on your device.

titleWording.send: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.claimReward: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.freeze: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.unfreeze: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.vote: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.delegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.undelegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.redelegate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.claimRewardCompound: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.nominate: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.chill: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.bond: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.unbond: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.rebond: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation
titleWording.withdrawUnbonded: Please confirm on your device to finalize the operation

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.switchLabelTerms: <0>I have read and agree with the</0> <1>Terms of Use</1>
Terms.switchLabelPrivacyPolicy: <0>I have read and agree with the</0> <1>Privacy Policy</1>
Terms.switchLabelLoss: I understand that if I lose this recovery phrase,  I will not be able to access my crypto in case I lose access to Nano.

stellar.memoWarningText: When using a Memo, carefully verify the type used with the recipient

cosmos.memoWarningText: When using a memo, carefully check the information with the recipient

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.title: There is a pending operation for this account.
AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.description: Wait for the operation to go through.

AlgorandASANotOptInInRecipient.title: Recipient account has not opted in the selected ASA.

NoAccessToCamera.title: Please ensure your system has a camera, that it is not in use by another application and that Ledger Live has permission to use it.

ClaimRewardsFeesWarning.title: The rewards are smaller than the estimated fees to claim them

CompoundLowerAllowanceOfActiveAccountErr.title: You cannot reduce the amount approved while having an active deposit.

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.title: Unauthorized signature
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnauthorized.description: This account is not authorized to sign this transaction

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.title: Insufficient funds
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientFunds.description: Make sure the account used has enough funds and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.title: Invalid address
CosmosBroadcastCodeInvalidAddress.description: Please check the address and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.title: Unknown address
CosmosBroadcastCodeUnknownAddress.description: Please check the address and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.title: Insufficient coins
CosmosBroadcastCodeInsufficientCoins.description: Make sure the account used has enough funds and try again

CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.title: The Memo field is too long
CosmosBroadcastCodeMemoTooLarge.description: Please reduce the size of the memo text and try again

CurrencyNotSupported.title: {{currencyName}} is not supported
CurrencyNotSupported.description: This crypto asset is not yet supported. Please contact Ledger Support.

DeviceInOSUExpected.title: Sorry, update failed
DeviceInOSUExpected.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

DeviceHalted.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceHalted.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

DeviceSocketFail.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceSocketFail.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again. ({{message}})

DisconnectedDevice.title: Sorry, it looks like your device disconnected

DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.title: Sorry, it looks like your device disconnected

FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.title: Firmware or app update required
FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.description: Please use the Manager to uninstall all apps then check if a firmware update is available before reinstalling them

HardResetFail.title: Sorry, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Sorry, there's nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Please contact Ledger Support if you cannot use your device.

LedgerAPI4xx.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPI4xx.description: Please check your connection and try again or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPI5xx.title: Sorry, try again.
LedgerAPI5xx.description: The server could not handle your request. Please try again later or contact Ledger Support. {{message}}

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Sorry, that's already installed
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Please check which apps are already installed on your device.

ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.title: {{dependency}} app required
ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.description: If the {{dependency}} app is already installed, please reinstall it with the latest version

ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.description: You must first uninstall all apps that require the {{appName}} app

ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.title: Uninstall all apps from your device
ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.description: The private keys to access your crypto assets will stay safe on your device and must be backed up on your Recovery sheet.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Sorry, not enough storage left
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstall some apps to free up space. The private keys to access your crypto assets will stay safe on your device.

install.title: Finish app installation in progress?
install.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app installation. Please finish the installation to install the apps in the queue.

uninstall.title: Finish app uninstallation in progress?
uninstall.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app uninstallations in progress.

update.title: Finish app updates in progress?
update.description: Quitting the Manager will terminate the app updates in progress.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last

NetworkDown.title: Sorry, internet seems to be down

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts were found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with the address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support

NotEnoughBalance.title: Sorry, insufficient funds
NotEnoughBalance.description: Please make sure the account has enough funds.

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: Recipient address is inactive. Send at least {{minimalAmount}} to activate it

NotEnoughGas.title: The ETH balance in the parent account is insufficient for network fees

SatStackAccessDown.title: Could not reach full node
SatStackAccessDown.description: Please verify that SatStack and your node are running. Check the full node setup in the Settings if the problem persists.

SatStackStillSyncing.title: Node sync in progress...
SatStackStillSyncing.description: Please wait while your node is syncing. Sending is not possible since your Bitcoin account balances may be incorrect.

SatStackVersionTooOld.title: Please upgrade SatStack
SatStackVersionTooOld.description: The SatStack version you are using is too old and may contain bugs or incompatibilities.

SatStackDescriptorNotImported.title: Account not scanned by full node
SatStackDescriptorNotImported.description: Please configure your full node to scan for the accounts associated with this device. Your full node must first scan the blockchain for this account before you can add it to your portfolio.

StratisDown2021Warning.title: The Stratis blockchain evolved and may no longer work correctly.
StratisDown2021Warning.description: Support for the original Stratis blockchain will be maintained until 16 October 2021.

SwapGenericAPIError.title: Exchange rate expired
SwapGenericAPIError.description: You must confirm the swap before the timer runs out. The exchange rate displayed remains valid for 60 seconds.

TimeoutError.title: Sorry, server took too long to respond

TimeoutTagged.title: Sorry, server took too long to respond ({{tag}})

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

TransportRaceCondition.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device

DeviceShouldStayInApp.title: Please open the {{appName}} app
DeviceShouldStayInApp.description: Keep the {{appName}} app open while we find your accounts

UnexpectedBootloader.title: Sorry, your device must not be in Bootloader mode
UnexpectedBootloader.description: Please restart your device without touching the buttons when the logo appears. Contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Update cancelled on device
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: All apps on your device have been uninstalled. Keep your device up to date to benefit from improvements in security and functionality.

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Action rejected
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: User rejected the operation on the device

TransactionRefusedOnDevice.title: Operation denied on device
TransactionRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support if in doubt

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt

UpdateYourApp.title: App update required
UpdateYourApp.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

DeviceOnDashboardExpected.title: Return to the Dashboard
DeviceOnDashboardExpected.description: Please navigate back to the Dashboard on your device

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Something went wrong
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: Please check that your hardware wallet is set up with the recovery phrase or passphrase associated to the selected account.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: App update required
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address

InvalidAddressBecauseDestinationIsAlsoSo.title: Recipient address is the same as the sender address

CantOpenDevice.title: Sorry, connection failed
CantOpenDevice.description: Device detected but connection failed. Please try again or contact Ledger Support if the problem persists.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address

CantScanQRCode.title: Couldn't scan this QR code: auto-verification not supported by this address

FeeNotLoaded.title: Couldn't load fee rates. Please set manual fees

GasLessThanEstimate.title: This may be too low. Please increase

list.1: Disconnect and reconnect the USB cable without pressing any buttons.
list.2: Press both buttons together three times to display the Dashboard.
list.3: Open the Manager and click Update firmware.

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.title: Cannot receive in subaccounts
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.description: If you want to receive funds, please use the parent account

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.title: Cannot send from subaccounts yet
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.description: This feature will be added at a later stage due to changes recently introduced by the Babylon update.

RecommendUndelegation.title: Please undelegate the account before emptying it

NotSupportedLegacyAddress.title: This legacy address format is no longer supported

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the '{{managerAppName}}' app on your device

DeviceNameInvalid.title: Please choose a device name without '{{invalidCharacters}}'

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.title: Rename cancelled on device
UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.description: Try again and allow renaming on your device

SyncError.title: Synchronization error
SyncError.description: Some accounts could not be synchronized.

TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Bandwidth

TronNoFrozenForEnergy.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForEnergy.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Energy

TronUnfreezeNotExpired.title: Unfreeze is not available yet
TronUnfreezeNotExpired.description: You need to wait 3 days after your last Freeze operation

TronInvalidVoteCount.title: Vote format is incorrect
TronInvalidVoteCount.description: You can only vote using round numbers

TronRewardNotAvailable.title: Reward is not claimable yet
TronRewardNotAvailable.description: You need to wait 24 hours between claims

TronNoReward.title: There is no reward to claim

TronInvalidFreezeAmount.title: Amount to freeze cannot be lower than 1

TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.title: Sending TRC20 to a new account won't activate it
TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.description: The recipient account must be activated prior to sending TRC20 to it. Send either TRX or TRC10 to an account to activate it.

TronTransactionExpired.title: Transaction has expired
TronTransactionExpired.description: Signature must be applied within 30 seconds. Please try again.

TronNotEnoughEnergy.title: Not enough Energy to send this token

PairingFailed.title: Pairing unsuccessful
PairingFailed.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

GenuineCheckFailed.title: Genuine check failed
GenuineCheckFailed.description: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

EthAppPleaseEnableContractData.title: Please enable contract data in the Ethereum app settings

NotEnoughBalanceInParentAccount.title: Insufficient balance in the parent account

FeeTooHigh.title: Network fees are above 10% of the amount

StellarMemoRecommended.title: A memo may be required when sending to this recipient

PolkadotNotValidator.title: Some selected addresses are not validators

PolkadotLowBondedBalance.title: All bonded assets will be unbonded if < 1 DOT

PolkadotAllFundsWarning.title: Ensure you have enough balance left for future transaction fees

PolkadotDoMaxSendInstead.title: Balance cannot be below 1 DOT. Send max to empty accountd

PolkadotBondMinimumAmount.title: You must bond at least 1 DOT

PolkadotMaxUnbonding.title: You have exceeded the unbond limit

PolkadotValidatorsRequired.title: You must select at least one validator
